original_text:
Like birds hovering overhead,
    the Lord Almighty will shield Jerusalem;
he will shield it and deliver it,
    he will ‘pass over’ it and will rescue it.”
korean_text: 새가 날개 치며 그 새끼를 보호함 같이 나 만군의 여호와가 예루살렘을 보호할 것이라 그것을 호위하며 건지며 뛰어넘어 구원하리라 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: the Lord Almighty will shield Jerusalem
he will shield it and deliver it
he will 'pass over' it and will rescue it
